synopsis.text:
Cultural funding from the Japanese government's Agency of Cultural Affairs has enabled the creation of a captivating anime short film, featuring a high school student named Makoto Nakazono. Unbeknownst to most, Makoto possesses an unusual ability: he can perceive enigmatic 'black entities' responsible for stealing souls.

One day, Makoto finds himself in a startling encounter with one such entity, Akira Seno, who poses an inquiry: "Will you stand in our way?" With a hint of resignation, Makoto admits his inability to intervene. Little does he know, a menacing shadow looms over his cherished childhood friend, Hazuki.

As Makoto grapples with his mysterious power and the implications of Akira's interrogation, he remains oblivious to the impending threat to Hazuki's well-being. This thought-provoking anime explores the intricate balance between life and death, leaving viewers eager to uncover the secrets of Makoto's world.
